name: WebRTC for WP SoyDigital
author: Carlos Herrera

sections.description:
WebRTC button to enable your users call you directly from the web. With one clik will call you across the web browser and you receive a call on your landline o cell phone. WebRTC call button easily include with this plugin, widget or via shortcode

To receive calls you need to sign on the service in http://www.soydigital.com/plugin/webrtc-wp-form/

Languages: English, Spanish.
sections.installation:
1. Upload digital-rtc folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress the WebRTC button may not work well in all web browsers. WebRTC is particularly suitable for Chrome and Firefox
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Start service.
  • Add Costumer ID configutrarion.
  • Add Widget support

1.1

  • Fix any problem whit compatibilities in some others plugins

1.2

  • Fix css problems whit https webrtc access
